description: HIGH QUALITY GRADE “A” Heavy Duty genuine leather jacket men Here we offer coolest A-2 Flight Jacket and this Military Leather Jacket got famous all over the world in Military and Aviation community. This stylish air force leather Flight Jacket will give you the attitude look . Do not miss the chance to have one like it.

This item may be a pre-sale, if your required color and size is not in stock or if you demand anything made-to-order then it would be sent from our factory location which is why delivery may take up to 7-10 working days.
Please refer to the size chart we have provided in product images at the end.
INTERNATIONAL BUYERS: please note that our product price does not include any taxes or import duties. Please check with your country's customs for more information

Shipping & Delivery cycle takes no more than 7 to 10 working days (Unless any exception occurs). We only use reliable courier services as SkyNet & DHL for transportation of our goods. The tracking is available online as well.
Returns/Exchanges are accepted within 30 days of delivery of the item in original condition. All charges will be refunded.
After receiving the order, we will really appreciate if you can leave us a positive feedback.
In case you are not satisfied with the product or the service, please contact us before leaving a negative feedback. We will try to resolve the issue to the best of our ability.
